attributes.action: We the undersigned would like the UK to rejoin the EU
attributes.background: We the undersigned ask for parliament to take into account the wish of the people and rejoin the EU as soon as possible or call a referendum on the question of joining the EU

rejection.details:
The UK has not yet left the EU. If you would like a second referendum on the UK's membership of the EU, you might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
